name: Timothy Zahn's Parallax (turn-based 4X galactic conquest)
blurb: Explore, Expand, Exploit and Exterminate your way across a galaxy of Timothy Zahn's favorite aliens... and some of your own

rewards.reward: No Reward

Altruist   _____________________________   Pledge $1 or more (pretty much any amount you want) to show your support, to say "thanks" to Tim for all the awesome books he's written over the years, and to help make this game a reality. ______________________________ You'll also be kept in the loop and automatically receive the backer updates, so you can keep track of the Kickstarter as it progresses, and the game itself as it's being developed.
Early Bird Special: Multi-Platform Pass ______________________________ \r\nBack the project early, and get the Multi-Platform Pass reward for less!  Hurry - supplies are limited.

Multi-Platform Pass ______________________________ Contribute $15 and receive a personal license key which will unlock Parallax and let you play on Windows, Linux and any future platforms we release the game for (so you only need to buy a single key and you can use it everywhere).

Digital Bonus ______________________________ For $25, you'll receive the personal license key for Parallax, and a digital reward of your choice: unlimited DLC, the game soundtrack, a PDF of the Galactic Survey, a set of hi-res images suitable for computer desktop backgrounds, or the digital set of either Space Fleet or Alien game posters (see the project description for more details).

Digital Extras ______________________________ Receive the Parallax license key, and any 3 digital rewards of your choice: unlimited DLC, the game soundtrack, a PDF of the Galactic Survey, a set of hi-res images suitable for computer desktop backgrounds, or the digital set of either Space Fleet or Alien game posters (see the project description for more details).

Early Bird Special: Digital Complete ______________________________ Back the project now, and you'll receive everything from the Digital Complete reward tier for only $40 - get the Multi-Platform Pass, access to the backer forums to follow our progress, and all of the digital rewards.

Digital Complete ______________________________ The Parallax license key, and ALL of the digital rewards for the game: unlimited DLC, the game soundtrack, a PDF of the Galactic Survey, a set of hi-res images suitable for computer desktop backgrounds, and both digital sets of Space Fleet and Alien game posters (see the project description for more details).

Early Bird Special: Contributor ______________________________ Put your mark on the game, your name on a star, and your ideas on the table as an active member of the community - you'll get everything from the Contributor tier reward level for $15 less (but only if you hurry).

Contributor ______________________________ Beta access to the game, and access to the Contributor forum and web site, where you'll be able to participate in the discussion and make suggestions about the game's aliens, ships, technology and dialogue. ______________________________ If one of your ideas is selected for inclusion, we'll list your name in the credits (and in-game if applicable). ______________________________ We'll list you (or a name/ psuedonym of your choice) as a contributor in the Galactic Survey, and you'll get to name one of the stars that appear in the game and be listed as the Survey Captain for that star. ______________________________ Also Includes: everything from the Digital Complete reward tier.

Fleet Engineer ______________________________ Work as part of the team of Fleet Engineers that will design the alien space fleets for the game, and be listed as Fleet Engineer in the credits. Define the ship classes and their names, appearance, capabilities, strengths and weaknesses, and you'll also help design the poster for your Fleet. ______________________________ The Fleet Engineers, as a group, will help design a minimum of 10 Fleets, will help with the other fleets created by the Fleet Architects, and will design any unclaimed Fleets as well ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 1 extra Digital Complete license (2 total licenses), and a Backer T-shirt.

Vanguard ______________________________ An extra-special reward to early backers: pledge now, and you get to select the Linguist, Merchant Skipper, or Propeller Head reward tier when we finish the Kickstarter. ______________________________ Includes everything listed for the selected reward tier.

Linguist ______________________________ Help create all of the in-game dialogue for the faction leaders, their advisors and the diplomats, as well as many of the in-game messages. ______________________________ You won't just write the dialogue, you'll work with the Developer to plan out the dynamic dialogue structure, based on factors such as how the character is feeling, the available substitution phrases (similar to the way many games insert the player's name into the dialogue, but more advanced), and even how the speaker feels about the topic of conversation.  ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, an extra Digital Complete license, and a Backer T-Shirt.

Merchant Skipper ______________________________ Create, name and be listed as the discoverer of an exotic trade resource, famous galactic point of interest, or even one of the secondary (indigenous) alien races. Maybe you want to name some of the computer-controlled alien leaders or create a galactic event. Maybe something else? ______________________________ Backers at this reward level will be offered the opportunity to "fill in the blanks" on details, wherever needed in the content-development process, so their contribution will be fairly wide-ranging.  Rather than focus on a specific type of content, they will help define the underlying background content throughout the galaxy - their content will rarely be front-and-center in the game, but it will help make the galaxy feel real, varied, and engaging.  ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, an extra Digital Complete license, and a Backer T-shirt.

Propeller Head ______________________________ Create the technology that will be included in the game's Tech Tree, and be listed as the Lead Researcher (in-game) for at least one of the game's Tech items.  Backers at this level will have the option to help create all of the technology in the game. ______________________________ These backers will create the directly-researchable items, "secondary" discoveries, the usable items that are derived from (unlocked by) the research, and even have input into artifacts and alien-specific technologies.  They will also help create the in-game descriptions for all of the tech. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, an extra Digital Complete license, and a Backer T-shirt.

Gene Splicer ______________________________ Work with the development team to refine and add detail to the original 8 aliens, create 5 brand new alien races (as a group), and any of the Geneticist races that aren't pledged for. You'll also help choose the design for the posters.  ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 1 extra Digital Complete license (2 total licenses), and a Backer T-shirt.

Pick 2 ______________________________ Choose any 2 of the group reward tiers: Fleet Engineer, Linguist, Merchant Skipper, Propeller Head or Gene Splicer. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 1 extra Digital Complete license (2 total licenses), and a Backer T-shirt.

I Want It All! ______________________________ Participate in all 5 of the group reward tiers: Fleet Engineer, Linguist, Merchant Skipper, Propeller Head AND Gene Splicer. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 1 extra Digital Complete license (2 total licenses), and a Backer T-shirt.

Fleet Architect ______________________________ Work with us to design an entire alien space fleet for one of the races in the game, and be listed as Fleet Architect in the details. Ship classes and their names, appearance, capabilities, strengths and weaknesses are all guided by you. You'll also get to help design the poster for your Fleet, and get a free copy of it, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Receive a poster of your choice, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, a signed poster, 2 extra Digital Complete licenses (3 total licenses), and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with your Fleet's name.

Xenobiologist ______________________________ Got an awesome alien concept that just needs a little bit of refinement? Or maybe it\u2019s a really freaky-looking animal that you\u2019d love to see as an alien race. Whichever it is, we\u2019ll work with you to flesh out your idea and make it a playable faction in the game (which could actually consist of multiple related aliens).  Then help design the poster for your aliens, and get a free copy of it, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ To help you refine your concept, you'll get direct access to the Developer, Artist and Composer to work through your idea and create the alien race's appearance, behavior, special musical elements, lifecycle, unique abilities, history, psychology, and even the aliens\u2019 ancient lore. ______________________________ Receive a poster of your choice and a Galactic Survey, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, a signed poster, a signed Galactic Survey, 4 extra Digital Complete licenses (5 total licenses), and and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with your Faction's name.

Hubris ______________________________ Like looking at yourself? Wanna share with the rest of the galaxy? Now's your chance: become digitally  immortalized as one of the human advisors in the game - Political, Military, Technology, Xeno, Trade or Espionage (your image will be on the advisor's button throughout the game). You'll also have significant input into the counselor's in-game personality and dialogue, and every counselor of the same type (for the other factions) will use this dialogue. ______________________________ Get direct, priority access to the development team (the Developer, Artist and Composer) to provide input on any part of the game you choose. ______________________________ Receive a poster of your choice and a Galactic Survey, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, a signed poster, a signed Galactic Survey, 4 extra Digital Complete licenses (5 total licenses), and a special Backer T-Shirt embroidered, with your Advisor's title.

Factotum ______________________________ Too good for hubris and too humble to brag?  Serve as the Human ruler's right hand, as the Empire Advisor.  You'll be the face on the Empire button and your full-screen image will be on the Faction Selection screen. ______________________________ Get direct, priority access to the development team (the Developer, Artist and Composer) to provide input on any part of the game you choose. ______________________________ Receive a poster of your choice and a Galactic Survey, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, a signed poster, a signed Galactic Survey, 9 extra Digital Complete licenses (10 total licenses),and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with either "Factotum" or "Empire Advisor" (your choice).

The Greater Mysteries ______________________________ Help create a secret so secret we can't even really explain what it is or how it works because we really want to let other players discover them for themselves (and we don't want to spoil the surprise). Here's a hint, though: you know those awesome twists that Tim likes to include in his stories?  ______________________________ Timothy Zahn will personally help you refine and add nuances to your idea (through a project-specific email address - see the FAQ for details), as will the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Receive 2 posters of your choice and 2 Galactic Surveys, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 2 signed posters, 2 signed Galactic Surveys, 9 extra Digital Complete licenses (10 total licenses), and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with your Mystery's code name.

Diplomat ______________________________ Serve as the public face for the Human faction's ruler - every time the non-human factions want to talk politics, your image will be the one the player sees on the Diplomacy screen. ______________________________ You'll be included in all of the conversations with the Greater Mysteries backers, Timothy Zahn, and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Receive 3 posters of your choice and 3 Galactic Surveys, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 3 signed posters, 3 signed Galactic Surveys, 9 extra Digital Complete licenses (10 total licenses), and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with "Diplomat".

In Other News ______________________________ Create your own galactic news channel, and keep the players up-to-date on all the latest events (in the game). You'll get to design the format, appearance, content and dialogue for the entire channel. ______________________________  You'll be included in all of the conversations with the Greater Mysteries backers, Timothy Zahn, and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Receive 5 posters of your choice and 5 Galactic Surveys, signed by Timothy Zahn and the rest of the development team. ______________________________ Also Includes: the Contributor reward, 5 signed posters, 5 signed Galactic Surveys, 9 extra Digital Complete licenses (10 total licenses), and a special Backer T-Shirt, embroidered with "News", "Media Mogul" or some other phrase of your choice.
